title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 80 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 80 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.
lineList.cn: （亚萨的诗，交与伶长，调用为证的百合花）领约瑟如领羊群的以色列的牧者阿，求你留心听。坐在二基路伯上的阿，求你发出光来。

lineList.en: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.
lineList.cn: 在以法莲便雅悯玛拿西前面施展你的大能，来救我们。

lineList.en: Turn us again, O God, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
lineList.cn: 神阿，求你使我们回转（回转或作复兴），使你的脸发光，我们便要得救。

lineList.en: O LORD God of hosts, how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people?
lineList.cn: 耶和华万军之神阿，你向你百姓的祷告发怒，要到几时呢。

lineList.en: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears; and givest them tears to drink in great measure.
lineList.cn: 你以眼泪当食物给他们吃，又多量出眼泪给他们喝。

lineList.en: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours: and our enemies laugh among themselves.
lineList.cn: 你使邻邦因我们分争。我们的仇敌彼此戏笑。

lineList.en: Turn us again, O God of hosts, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
lineList.cn: 万军之神阿，求你使我们回转，使你的脸发光，我们便要得救。

lineList.en: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt: thou hast cast out the heathen, and planted it.
lineList.cn: 你从埃及挪出一棵葡萄树，赶出外邦人，把这树栽上。

lineList.en: Thou preparedst room before it, and didst cause it to take deep root, and it filled the land.
lineList.cn: 你在这树根前豫备了地方，他就深深扎根，爬满了地。

lineList.en: The hills were covered with the shadow of it, and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars.
lineList.cn: 他的影子遮满了山，枝子好像佳美的香柏树。

lineList.en: She sent out her boughs unto the sea, and her branches unto the river.
lineList.cn: 他发出枝子，长到大海，发出蔓子，延到大河。

lineList.en: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges, so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her?
lineList.cn: 你为何拆毁这树的篱笆，任凭一切过路的人摘取。

lineList.en: The boar out of the wood doth waste it, and the wild beast of the field doth devour it.
lineList.cn: 林中出来的野猪，把他糟踏，野地的走兽，拿他当食物。

lineList.en: Return, we beseech thee, O God of hosts: look down from heaven, and behold, and visit this vine;
lineList.cn: 万军之神阿，求你回转，从天上垂看，眷顾这葡萄树，

lineList.en: And the vineyard which thy right hand hath planted, and the branch that thou madest strong for thyself.
lineList.cn: 保护你右手所栽的，和你为自己所坚固的枝子。

lineList.en: It is burned with fire, it is cut down: they perish at the rebuke of thy countenance.
lineList.cn: 这树已经被火焚烧被刀砍伐，他们因你脸上的怒容就灭亡了。

lineList.en: Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand, upon the son of man whom thou madest strong for thyself.
lineList.cn: 愿你的手杖扶持你右边的人，就是你为自己所坚固的人子。

lineList.en: So will not we go back from thee: quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.
lineList.cn: 这样，我们便不退后离开你。求你救活我们，我们就要求告你的名。

lineList.en: Turn us again, O LORD God of hosts, cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
lineList.cn: 耶和华万军之神阿，求你使我们回转，使你的脸发光，我们便要得救。
